name: Earths New Year Kablooey
description:
You had just one job ever since you were 3 years old. Stay up past midnight every new years eve or the world will explode. But maybe you just imagined that. 

Features:

- Multiple Endings

- Trivia suitable for earthlings

- Some weird characters

This was a short visual novel project I made between Christmas and New Years eve for fun and practice. Playtime is fairly short.
